name: Cinema 4D Layout
summary: Learn about .L4D files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Cinema 4D is a Windows and macOS app that provides various features for creating realistic images and graphics for games, movies, architectural design, and motion graphics. The L4D format allows you to customize the app layout to preserve and share with other Cinema 4D users. To save a layout as an L4D file, select Window → Customization → Save Layout as.

Additionally, users can create multiple L4D files that store layouts for different editing tasks. For example, while one perspective may be for editing 3D object geometry, another may have a better layout for animation.

instructions: You can open an L4D file with Maxon Cinema 4D in Windows and macOS. To open an L4D file, select Window → Customization → Load Layout.
